channel.title: Help with Hosting Server
channel.description:
Umm first of all hi everyone ;)
So I quit Private servers about 2 years ago, but I decided to make a comeback. So since I reformatted my comp I had to redo all the server hosting process but weirdly it doesn't work. Here is what I have:
1: JDK. I have JDK 1.6.0_23 so no problem here 2: No-IP: Umm it seems ok but ill post pics just to be sure... [img]http://i913.photobucket.com/albums/ac340/maximalx5_01/No-IP1-1.jpg[/img][img]http://i913.photobucket.com/albums/ac340/maximalx5_01/No-IP2.jpg[/img] 3: Environmental Variables: Here is what my PATH and CLASSPATH are: PATH: [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;%SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;[/code] CLASSPATH: [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code] 4: Port Forwarding: I portforwarded and here is a pic: [img]http://i913.photobucket.com/albums/ac340/maximalx5_01/Portforward1.jpg[/img]
So anyone find the error? Don't think i forgot something but it's possible...
EDIT: Pics dont seem to work, fixing ;)

item.title: Help with Hosting Server
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

exactly…

I don’t know the error…

I did everything as mentioned ans when I try to log in, it says unable to connect to server…

I tried with 4 servers and 3 clients and still does the same thing…

Read full topic

Whats the error? All you’ve said is you can’t host.

item.title: Help with Hosting Server
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

Umm first of all hi everyone

So I quit Private servers about 2 years ago, but I decided to make a comeback. So since I reformatted my comp I had to redo all the server hosting process but weirdly it doesn’t work. Here is what I have:

1: JDK. I have JDK 1.6.0_23 so no problem here
2: No-IP: Umm it seems ok but ill post pics just to be sure…

3: Environmental Variables: Here is what my PATH and CLASSPATH are:
PATH: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;%SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;
CLASSPATH:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

4: Port Forwarding: I portforwarded and here is a pic:

So anyone find the error? Don’t think i forgot something but it’s possible…

EDIT: Pics dont seem to work, fixing

Read full topic
